dmca.title: Cease and Desist letter - Pleae stop this abuse with your websites on your server htt
dmca.body:
We are unable to locate on the web page
http://divorce-explained.info/?p=478 any of the material that you claim
is being infringed as of 9:45:32 a.m. (GMT-6).

Legal Response Team
ThePlanet.com 

-----Original Message-----
From: Psychic "Rose(r) [mailto:seepsychicrose@yahoo.com] 
Posted At: Saturday, June 10, 2006 3:47 PM
Posted To: Legal Response
Conversation: Cease and Desist letter - Pleae stop this abuse with your
websites on your server http://divorce-explained.info/?p=478
Subject: Cease and Desist letter - Pleae stop this abuse with your
websites on your server http://divorce-explained.info/?p=478


divorce-explained.info " Blog Archive " Divorce -
br'>www.divorceinfo.com/ - 12k - Cached ... First Psychic Trademark-
True Gift New Client: 5 min for $5.00 cc req. www.PsychicRose.org
Attorney at Law ...divorce-explained.info/?p=478 - 60k - Cached - More
from this site - Save

http://divorce-explained.info/?p=478

Stop this abuse constantly with redirects using my trademark and
copyright content. 

Psychic Rose(r)

www.TarotCardReadingsByPsychicRose.com

Email:  SeePsychicRose@yahoo.com
PO BOX 2471
RONKONKOMA, NY 11779
(631) 331-4860


To whom it may concern:

It has come to my attention that you are advertising my Trademark name
Psychic Rose.    Please be
advised that this name is in fact a Trademark name and by law you are
not permitted to use it without my express written consent.  You have
been using my duly registered mark Psychic Rose to advertise your own
services on the Internet or anywhere.

By law you are not permitted to use it without express written consent
from Psychic Rose.
Otherwise, your use of the Trademark name Psychic Rose infringes upon
the federal intellectual property rights of Psychic Rose and your
conduct further violates H.R.S. Ch. 481A which makes it unlawful for a
person to engage in unfair and deceptive trade practices. 

Accordingly, we must hereby demand on behalf of Psychic Rose that you
immediately cease and desist from using the word mark Psychic Rose.
Psychic Rose is considering taking legal proceedings which means filing
a Federal Court complaint you can be liable for damages and Attorney
fees.

Therefore, I request that you Cease and Desist from using my Trademark
name completely.   Please
cooperate. 

"I represent that the information in this notification is true and
correct and that I am the Trademark owner."

Any questions, you can contact my legal Department at 631-331-4860.

Respectfully,
Psychic Rose(r)
Reg. No. 3,013,312
